articles.description: Emily Mortimer wrote and directed this adaptation of the 1945 novel. Lily James and Emily Beecham star as the two friends at romantic crossroads.
articles.content: We all certainly know that Emily Mortimer is one of the best actors around, whether you enjoyed her in The Newsroom or any one of her dozens of movie roles. But with Doll & Em, she proved that sh… [+6627 chars]

articles.title: Welcome 2 Prince’s America - Vulture
articles.description: As told by the band who helped make the late legend’s “lost” album Welcome 2 America over a decade ago — never released until now.
articles.content: The aughts werean intriguing time for Prince; with 2004s Musicology and 2006s 3121, he appeared to rediscover a love of the crisp, commercial funk he had started to move away from in the late 90s. He… [+15571 chars]
